articles.title: Bitcoin Drops Below $70,000, Wiping Out Gain Since Trump’s Win - Bloomberg
articles.description: Bitcoin tumbled below $61,000, as the unwinding of leveraged bets and broader market turbulence deepened a selloff that has wiped out all of the gains since President Donald Trump’s election set off a speculative rush into cryptocurrencies.
